reviewText: I enjoyed this DVD which is full of action and also reflects the dedication of these fishermen who often have to accept the reality of unfavourable weather and the power of some of these massive fish. It is reassuring to see that sustainable fishing practice was followed

Love this DVD set.  I bought it to be able to put in slow mo and freeze frame to see the gear and other stuff.  Also to rerun parts to learn how to tuna fish.  Now I qualify as a gogan and can go fishing and make a bunch of dumb mistakes for those guys to complaiin about.  Maybe if my mistake is dumb enough I will get on TV!
Exciting, familiar with crews and cheering out loud!
Great show on tuna fishing very exciting when the reel in the gaint blue fin tuna. Great DVD to add to your collections a must see DVD.

Very happy with the item, our family is a big fan of the show, we have even met all of them in Gloucester! Knew we wouldn't be disappointed with dvd. Very quick shipping, made my son very happy on Christmas because this was a gift for him. Will eventually purchase other seasons!
Can't wait for season 3.  Loved every minute of this series.  If you like to fish, this is a must see!!!
I fish for tuna and love this show. I should have purchased DVD of 1st season instead of online version.
